name: Retail Outlet
uniques: [+1 Gold, +1 Happiness] from [Luxury resource] tiles [in this city]
[+1 Gold] from each Trade Route

civilopediaText.text: Various ARC branded products line its shelves, popular among the wealthy and brmming with retail profits.

name: Financial Intelligence Agency
uniques: Requires a [Spy Satellite Network] in all cities
Consumes [1] [Digital Storage Space]
All newly-trained [Stealth Infantry] units [in this city] receive the [Spook] promotion
Cost increases by [30] per owned city

civilopediaText.text: Ensuring ARC's financial stability, in various ways.

name: Automated Heavy Industry
uniques: [+10]% Production when constructing [Armored] units [in this city]
[+5]% Production when constructing [All] wonders [in this city]
[+10]% Production when constructing [All] buildings [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: A more massive version of the Robotics Assembly Plant, and almost entirely automated.

name: Urban Commune
uniques: Prefab

civilopediaText.text: The cramped living conditions in ole Earth's PAC territories has resulted in a shared living space where colonists could relax - or create things, or grow things.

name: Market District
uniques: [+1 Gold] from [Bonus resource] tiles [in this city]
[+1 Gold] from [Luxury resource] tiles [in this city]

[+2 Gold] <during a Golden Age>

civilopediaText.text: A sprawling general market that takes up a district, businesses of all kinds are thriving here. Try out the street food!

name: Diplomatic Office
uniques: [+3 Culture] <when not at war>
[-5]% maintenance cost for buildings [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Envoys and dignitaries mingle with diplomats and bureaucrats in this building.

name: Cultural Square
uniques: Prefab

civilopediaText.text: This area provides authentic old Earth recreational and cultural activities, from sports to dances and festivals. Everyone is welcome to join.

name: Sermon Station
uniques: Prefab
Hidden when religion is disabled

name: Orbital Industry
uniques: Orbital
[+5]% [Production] [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: An orbital station designed for human habitation, it is intended to be fully self-sufficient.
